snippet.title: Skygard Arena - Beta Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Join the Beta on Steam ➡️ https://store.steampowered.com/app/2148970/Skygard_Arena/
The Beta will be available from June 10th to June 30th.

Skygard Arena is a tactical RPG with a roster of Champions embodied by different Personas and a unique combat system centered around capturing objectives. Build your own team with deep customization options, lead your Champions in turn-based battles and land game-winning combos!

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/21
Join our community on Discord: https://discord.gg/2VtCTVgbzh
Twitter: https://twitter.com/SkygardArena
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/skygardarena/

© 2024. All rights reserved. Developed by Gemelli Games.
